puff up.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to become bigger by increasing the amount of air inside, or to make something bigger in this way
puff up.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The pastry will puff up while it bakes.
Birds puff up their feathers to keep warm.
puff up.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if a part of your body puffs up, it swells painfully because of injury or infection
puff up.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: My eye had puffed up because of a mosquito bite.
